title: The Boy and His Angel
description: Ever wondered what happened to Liam and Amber after you last saw them dancing in that studio? Well, after years of people asking and asking for a sequel.... this isn't one, I'm afraid. BUT it is a FREE catch up / where are they now, short story! Set a few years after the ending of The Boy Who Sneaks in My Bedroom Window, now you can catch up with Liam and his Angel in this fun, free read exclusive to newsletter subscribers! Please see my review in the comments (or click on my bio) for the link to your free short story!
author: Kirsty Moseley
